algorithm_technique: Frequency map (Counter) to track color counts and a lookup map to store ball-to-color assignments.
problem_summary_simple: Count distinct colors on balls after each query that assigns a color to a ball.
problem_summary_technical: Use a hash map to store the current color of each ball and a frequency map (Counter) to track the counts of each color. Update counts when a ball's color changes.
key_insights: When a ball's color changes, we need to decrement the count of its old color and increment the count of its new color.
If a color's count drops to zero, it's no longer a distinct color.
The number of distinct colors is simply the size of the frequency map (Counter).
